ingredients.content: ½ orange, zest only, no white pith
50 g brown onion, cut into halves
150 g pumpkin, peeled and cut into pieces (3-4 cm)
150 g carrot, peeled and cut into pieces (3-4 cm)
½ tsp chicken stock paste (see Tips)
1 - 2 pinches ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place ginger, orange zest and onion into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>1 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add pumpkin and carrot and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water and stock and cook <b>12 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add butter, salt and pepper and purée <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>. Adjust seasoning to taste and serve as desired.
